{"city": "Martinez", "state": "CA", "name": "Community Produce Program", "address": "1301 Alhambra Ave,", "phone": "925 335-5890", "notes": "Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Search About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate About Us About Us Our Programs Who We Are Financials Blog Newsroom Careers Contact Ways to Give Ways to Donate Give Food Give Stock Legacy Giving Corporate Giving Other Ways to Give Get Involved Volunteer Advocate Host a Fund Drive Events & Promotions Find Food Find Food in My City CalFresh Nutrition & Recipes Donate Partner Agency Volunteer Partner Agency Volunteer Get Food Martinez Printer Friendly List Community Produce Program Families and individuals can pick up to 20 pounds of FREE fresh produce twice a month. Please choose ONE location. Boys & Girls Club of Martinez , 1301 Alhambra Ave, Martinez , 2nd & 4th Friday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. John Muir Elementary School , 205 Vista Way, Martinez , 2nd & 4th Friday 4:00-5:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Martinez Health Center , 2500 Alhambra Blvd, Martinez , 2nd & 4th Monday 12:00-1:00pm.
							Please bring two bags with handles. Partner Food Pantry Pantries provide FREE food to the public. Please note: Each pantry has its own guidelines. Check with them about specific eligibility requirements and pick-up limits. Martinez Adult Education (Drive-Thru), 600 F St, Martinez , Tuesday 2:00-3:00pm. Phone: 925 335-5890 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Second Baptist Church of Martinez , 1020 Las Juntas, Martinez , 2nd & 4th Saturday 11:00am-12:00pm. Phone: 925-228-3860 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. St. Catherine’s (SVdP) , 1125 Ferry St, Martinez , Saturday 9:30-10:30am.
							Go to the door on the right side of the office building. Phone: 925-788-7409 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Partner Soup Kitchen Soup kitchens provide FREE meals to anyone who comes in during meal hours. Menus vary, although each soup kitchen tries to offer balanced meals. Loaves & Fishes of Contra Costa , 835 Ferry St, Martinez , Monday-Sunday 11:00am-12:45pm. Phone: 925-293-4792 Call to confirm hours and special holiday distributions. Senior Food Program FREE groceries twice a month to individuals aged 55 or older who meet income guidelines. Only one senior per household can receive food. Bring a picture ID and proof of address (PG&E bill, for example). Teamsters Local 315 Hall , 2727 Alhambra Ave, Martinez , 1st & 3rd Thursday 9:00-10:00am. Printer Friendly List Locations Concord: 925-676-7543 4010 Nelson Ave
Concord, CA 94520 Fairfield: 707-421-9777 2370 N Watney Way
